alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wheatland, western Golden Valley and north central Sweet Grass Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Harlowton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail, along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Wheatland, western Golden Valley and north central Sweet Grass Counties. The storm will cross highway 191 south of Harlowton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
